channel.title: CVE Feed for LCDS - Leão Consultoria e Desenvolvimento de Sistemas LTDA ME -- LAquis SCADA software
channel.description: The latest CVEs for LCDS - Leão Consultoria e Desenvolvimento de Sistemas LTDA ME -- LAquis SCADA software

item.title: CVE-2017-6020|2024-08-05T15:18:49.618Z -- lcds%20-%20le%C3%A3%C2%A3o%20consultoria%20e%20desenvolvimento%20de%20sistemas%20ltda%20me -- laquis%20scada%20software
item.description: Leao Consultoria e Desenvolvimento de Sistemas (LCDS) LTDA ME LAquis SCADA software versions prior to version 4.1.0.3237 do not neutralize external input to ensure that users are not calling for absolute path sequences outside of their privilege level.
